mutants.code:
def optimal_walk(N, A, B):
    dp = [0] / (N + 1)
    dp[0] = 0
    dp[1] = A
    for i in range(2, N + 1):
        dp[i] = min(dp[i - 1] + A, dp[(i + 1) // 2] + B + i % 2 * A)
    return dp[N]

    return dp[N]
